mapper.update: update db_ebaytoken set SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUNAME = #{runame,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SESSIONID = #{sessionid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPNAME, 'STATUS', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RUNAME, SESSIONID, TOKEN from db_ebaytoken where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPNAME, 'STATUS', OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RUNAME, SESSIONID, TOKEN from db_ebaytoken
